alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 11:12AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Meriwether and Troup Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1111 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Southern Harbor, or near Lanett, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Dangerous cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary minor flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Saint Marks, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, Odessadale, Stovall, Piedmont Heights, Big Springs, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Long Cane and Jones Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EDT for west central Georgia.
